short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: You can translate selected text in your prefered language from the new tab

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Search results will be provided by Microsoft Bing.

You will be able to easily translate text, directly from your new tab!

By clicking "Add to Chrome", I accept and agree to installing the Web Translator extension and it will provide default search results by Microsoft Bing as described by the service in the Terms of Use and Privacy Policy
 
Uninstall Instructions: https://www.getwebtranslator.com/uninstall.html
EULA/Terms of Use - https://www.getwebtranslator.com/terms.html
Privacy Policy - https://www.getwebtranslator.com/policy.html
Contact Us: http://www.getwebtranslator.com/terms.html#terms-contact

To remove our extension from Google Chrome:
 
1) Click on the three horizontal lines icon in the upper right-hand corner of your Chrome browser.
2) Go to "Settings".
3) In the menu that appears click on "Extensions".
4) From the list of installed Extensions, find the name of the toolbar extension you wish to uninstall.
5) Click on the trash can icon to the right of "Enable" (for the toolbar extension you wish to uninstall).
6) Close your browser completely and reopen it. Our toolbar extension should be removed from your Chrome browser.
